voting.title: Which image best matches this prompt?
voting.instruction: Click on the image you think best matches the prompt
voting.instructionMobile: Tap on the image you think best matches the prompt

confirmation.title: Thanks for voting!
confirmation.message: Your vote helps us compare AI image models

errors.voteFailed: Failed to submit vote. Please try again.
errors.noPromptsMessage: Please run the ingestion script to populate the database.

About.metaDescription: Learn about the creator of the AI Image Model Comparison Voting Application
About.name: Your Name
About.bioText: This application was created to provide an unbiased platform for comparing AI-generated images from different models. By using a fairness algorithm and complete URL anonymization, we ensure that votes are based purely on image quality rather than model reputation.
